review: We were quite worried for our new born kid since I have endocrinology issues. The doctor was always patient to hear out all my queries and answer them to my satisfaction. She has never hurried up with us but patiently answered each question. We are happy with the doctor and the assurance and confidence she gives to new parents like us. Overall a very positive person which is very much required with a new born.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: She is a very experienced doctor, always explains her medications gives very structured approach to vaccination schedules and an amazing smoothness in giving vaccines with minimal pain to babies

***** ************* * **** **** **** Instead of comforting the parents she prefers to scare them with her inputs. She suggested me to admit my child who was doing fine except the eating habits which was not consistent like any other kid. Everytime you visit her you have to explain the issue twice first to her assistants and then to the doctor herself. There is a good chance that you may not be able to see the doctor when you visit her with reports as the assistant would do the needful. This is extremely unprofessional attitude as you have paid 600 for the doctor skills and experience. I am not visitng her again.

She spent less than 30 seconds with me and my son. Didnt check anything at first and insisted on multiple blood tests. After I insisted her to check my son, she called him faking the symptoms. I have seen my son suffering and puking 18 times in a day and didn't think Manipal hospital doctors behave like this! Wont recommend anyone to go to her!

we will go there for  to show my kid  ,for thyroid .
1. She always recommand the to test her lab itself which is very small .
2. they will charge the Rs: 700, wont give the bill also .
3. She will see only less than 5  min, won;t listen out works.
4. Only check the reports , say every thing is good.
5. Shows very much attitude.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Doctor seems to be so arrogant and make you feel scared always. She was so harsh speaking to my 2.4 year old son and was shouting on him. Felt so bad. For every thing she told sister will tell you all details. Gave 30 seconds to us. I have lived in almost major cities of India and this experience I will never forgot. Such a bad doctor.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: She clearly fails to communicate with her patients and has no compassion and value of time. As directed  took 9 test on Friday and collected the reports on saturday and went her the same day. We are told, " such cases are dealt only on wednesday. She could have informed us the same on friday. We requested  her but in vain#. As much as she sticks to her work ethics and values her time she could have  respect her patients time and money. **********  *** *************  ** **** *** ***** ** ********

I got my daughter for the check up, the doctor is such a rude person **** ***** **** **** **** ** *** she spoke so rudely to my daughter even though she is was unwell she spoke false language saying not to give her food and phone, instead consultation she mocked at her with vulgar language **** *** *** *** *** ***** *** **** *** ** *** *** *************** ******** ******* ** *** ***** ******* ** ****** ********** **** *** ***** ***** ***** **** I recommend u not to go **** ****** *** **** **** ***** *** *** ************ I just had bad experience *** ***** ******* ** ** ************ ** ***** **** **** **** **** **** *** ** **** **** ***** ** **** ** ** ******* ************ *** ** *** **** *** **** *** **** ** **** * **********

Being a pediatrician, the doctor is not very friendly to her patients/ patient's parents. First the assistant doctor **** ***** *** ** telling you to stop using feeding bottles, why don't you breast feed the baby *** ***** *********** ********** then this doctor will repeat the same questions *** ********* *** *** ********
Not worth to consult her...He sees patients only when they go for first. If patients goes for follow up doesn't sees her parents only. I don't recommend her for anything

Bypassing priority and sending patients according to their convenience 
We reached clinic on time, made us to wait for more than an hour.
Patients reached behind/ latter than us, able to consult doctor before us. Bad approach from clinic.

The doctor refused to see the patient since I was late by 1 hour ( the appointment was at 5:30; and I could reach only at 6:30pm). I had to once again take my 8-month old daughter to see a different doctor.

review: she was really nice and explained us issues with our kid's health and suggested best way treat it as well
